short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a decoded GMT/ISO tooltip for numeric epoch timestamps on highlight

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Double click any 10- or 13-digit number on the current web page and have a pop-up appear that shows the number interpreted as a timestamp, decoded to ISO 8601 Timestamp format. You can click the pop-up to copy the decoded timestamp to the clipboard.
